text:
Updated Review 4/30/2012 -

First shipment had multiple failures of the K-Cups, similar to many other reviewers.

BBR sent a replacement order. The brewing performance was improved - one of the first eight passed through some grounds, but not a total blowout. Found I had to brew a smaller cup than normal for acceptable flavor, and even so the coffee had a certain 'hollowness'. Not sure if it was just weak coffee, or the result of their filter system.
